about_the_game:
You got unchained with a purpose. Take control of the son of the Demiurge, and enter an interdimensional adventure where your choices matter, you will coexist with humans, and enemies will push you to the limit. Will you reach the power to interrupt the Feast of Abundance?

Demiurge Sacrifice is an atmospheric RPG-simulator that combines the brutal violence of dark fantasy with the tranquility of harvesting, gardening, socializing. All set in a supernatural medieval world and the next most important ritual ceremony on the continent.

Features:

  • Complex Battles: The protagonist Kadyr, will face challenging enemies in varying quantities depending on the level. Supernatural monsters of religious-body horror.

  • Offering Corpses: You will be able to tear off limbs, bodies, or even souls! from your dead enemies and deliver them as a gift to your sleeping mother in an infinite void.

  • Camouflage yourself powerfully: While you progress, you will be able to obtain costumes that will help you go unnoticed among the human world; and at the same time, empower yourself in combat.

  • Build Wisdom: Your actions in both worlds will help you build skills that you can improve and use to unlock more knowledge.

  • Get Links: On your adventure, you will meet other similar monsters as well as ordinary humans and future citizens of your world. Optionally, you can choose a woman as a partner.

  • Quest System:  Featuring varied quests that can be obtained either by the Demiurge and other places or NPC's.

short_description: You got unchained. And now, you shall travel between worlds to interrumpt the Feast of Abundance. You will reach this by fighting, building, interacting, gardening, doing quests and more. All of this on both worlds.
